attributes.action: Institute a full national inquiry into grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: This scandal is ongoing & the only way to bring it to an end is by a full independent enquiry.
attributes.background: Parliament should set up a full independent enquiry into the widespread grooming gang scandal in the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
